sense.def:
Izraz
possibly
pove, da nismo prepričani, ali je nekaj res oziroma se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: Television is possibly to blame for this.
We could possibly get some money by going to my parents.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
possibly
poudarimo, da smo presenečeni ali zmedeni.

seg.quote: How could it possibly accomplish anything?
I wondered what he could possibly be doing it for.

sense.def:
Izraz
possibly
uporabimo pred naklonskim glagolom, kadar želimo poudariti, da nekaj ne bi moglo biti narejeno bolje ali hitreje.

seg.quote: He will do everything he possibly can to aid you.
I have made myself as comfortable as I possibly can.
He planned to come back as soon as he possibly could.

sense.def:
Izraz
possibly
uporabimo z naklonskim glagolom v nikalni obliki, kadar želimo poudariti, da se nekaj ne more zgoditi ali da nečesa ni mogoče narediti.

seg.quote: I can't possibly stay in all the weekend.
Nobody could possibly tell the difference.
